comments:
java -jar org.eclipse.osgi_3.1.1.jar -console

Error: Exception in thread 
"main" java.lang.NullPointerException        at 
org.eclipse.core.runtime.adaptor.EclipseStarter.run(EclipseStarter.java:172) 
at 
org.eclipse.core.runtime.adaptor.EclipseStarter.main(EclipseStarter.java:136)

Happened because there was a space in the name of the dir it was installed in.

We did not decode spaces correctly in EclipseStarter.main.  I copied some code 
from org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main which does this for normal eclipse 
launching in startup.jar.
Reopening to consider backporting this to 3.1.2

Created an attachment (id=31635)
This is the correct patch!!

I attached the wrong patch.  Here is the correct one.
Patch reviewed. Tom to release and tag.
